summary: WHEN THE ANTI LOCK BRAKES HAVE BEEN APPLIED, THE BRAKES WILL LOCK UP AND THE VEHICLE WILL HAVE HEAVY VIBRATION. THUS CAUSING THE VEHICLE TO HAVE EXTENDED STOPPING DISTANCE.  THE DEALER HAD BEEN NOTIFIED.  PH  THE VEHICLE WOULD NOT STOP ON HEAVY SLICK SURFACES AND WOULD SLIDE OUT OF CONTROL.  SCC
